prompt: Create a modern OTP verification screen with clean white background. Display centered title 'Enter Verification Code' in bold dark text, followed by descriptive text explaining that a 6-digit code was sent to user's phone. Below this, implement 6 individual circular input fields arranged horizontally with subtle gray borders that turn blue when focused. Each field should accept only one digit and automatically move focus to next field. Add prominent blue 'Verify' button below input fields. Include 'Didn't receive code? Resend' link at bottom in blue text. Use proper spacing and padding throughout for professional appearance.
